Class NSAccessSupport

extends Object
    Provides signing and ACL checks for commands.
    Author:
    westy, arun

      • verifyAccess

        public static boolean verifyAccess(MetaDataTypeName accessType,
                                   String guid,
                                   String field,
                                   String accessorGuid,
                                   GNSApplicationInterface<String> activeReplica)
                            throws FailedDBOperationException
        Checks to see if the accessorGuid can access the field of the guid. Access type is some combo of read, and write, and blacklist or whitelist. Note: Blacklists are currently not supported.
        Parameters:
        accessType -
        guid -
        field -
        accessorGuid -
        activeReplica -
        Returns:
        true if the the reader has access
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException
